quotes: Anything you can do, I can do better.
It's true my enthusiastic little admirers.
Well, come on. Show Trixie what you've got!
Watch in awe as Trixies performs the most amazing feat for magic every witnessed by pony eyes!
Well, well, well. It seems we have some “neigh-sayers” in the audience.
The Great and Powerful Trixie doesn't trust wheels.
Witness, my subjects, graze upon an even greater and powerfuler Trixie!
Don't you think the Great and Apologetic Trixie is
the most magnificent humble pony you have ever seen?
